directiveAlignmentJustification: Schema simplification (v3.0) directly serves PROJECT-DIRECTIVE.md: (1) json_schema with strict:true achieves 100% schema compliance constraint, (2) consolidating opportunity fields improves 95%+ extraction accuracy goal, (3) dual-trigger webhook path updated to avoid confusion with n8n test webhooks, (4) additionalProperties:false on all objects per constraints
specsCompleteJustification: All 3 Code nodes have complete specs with tests: input_validator (17/17), category_config_loader (19/19), output_assembler (17/17) - total 53/53 Vitest tests passing
enforcerAuditedJustification: Enforcer audit completed via architect-reviewer - verdict: APPROVED_WITH_MODIFICATIONS. All 3 corrections implemented: (1) OTHER category clarified for cancellations/complaints/churn, (2) Address disambiguation - customer TO location, (3) Summary length 200 chars
researchDoneJustification: 42 sources documented across 8 source types (exceeds 25 minimum, 4 types minimum): OpenAI API docs (6), n8n official docs (6), n8n templates (5), n8n community (5), CRM/sales taxonomy (6), web tutorials (4), local project specs (6), local knowledge bases (4)
noIncompleteMarkersJustification: No TBD/TODO/PENDING markers in workflow code or configuration
testsPlannedJustification: Test plan complete: 53 local Vitest tests (all passing), 20 E2E primordial pipeline runs (19 v2.1 + 1 v3.0 schema validation), workflow validation passing
hierarchyRespectedJustification: Sequential development followed: Code nodes tested locally first -> deployed to n8n -> mock tested -> real API tested -> 3+ novel runs per entity -> whole workflow integration tested
changesInThisSession: Consolidated opportunity_summary + opportunity_type into single opportunity object
Updated webhook path from test/llm-data-extraction to webhook/llm-data-extraction
